name: Run, Forresta, Run!
description:
"Run, Forresta, Run!" is a simple endless (or not) runner made with the Godot Engine.

Help the mighty warrior, Forresta Wood to run as far as possible, while dodging obstacles and killing enemies. 

The game has 5 stages with different graphics. Finish them all to unlock Endless Mode and Reverse Mode - try running to the left!

Kill monsters to slow down a little, but you can jump over them as well. Rarely, a powerup will appear, which will save you from hitting an obstacle just one time.

Left mouse button or Up Arrow - jump

Z or Down Arrow - slide

X or Right Arrow - attack

Any feedback is welcome :)
